alert.note: Alert for Baca; Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 5:30PM MDT until August 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN BACA AND EAST CENTRAL LAS ANIMAS COUNTIES... At 530 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Kim, or 30 miles west of Springfield, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pritchett. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
